description: Let me tell you a secret. The creator doesn’t create crisis he creates opportunities. The covid plandemic is an opportunity to correct the path humanity was steered away from long ago. How each of us responds to evil that was ignored, denied, and allowed, being pushed to the surface now for purification, will be mirrored in a new era coming toward us. Either we wise up, rise up and cooperate to set ourselves free or continue to be seduced by deception and distraction, controlled by fear generating a fate worse than can be imagined. The opportunity in front of us right now we may never see in our lifetime again. It is up to every person of good conscience to equip themselves with new awareness, cooperate with one another, take back personal power, inform others, commit to saving your body, mind and spirit and leverage covid measures as your ticket to freedom.
